      • digitTyped

        private boolean digitTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Handles key event. If the key event is a digit, and not delete, backspace, or enter, returns true. Otherwise it consumes the key event, returns false, and beeps.
        Parameters:
        e - key event (goal of this method is the key event will be a digit)
        Returns:
        true if key event is a digit

      • textField_keyTyped

        public void textField_keyTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Handles a key event in the text field. If the key event is a not a digit, or is delete, backspace, or enter it consumes the event. Otherwise it creates a new runnable which lasts the length of input into textfield and parses the double typed there.
        Parameters:
        e -
